<button id="login">Log In</button>
<button id="logout" style="display:none;">Log Out</button>
<p id="user-info"></p>




<script>
    let auth0 = null;

    async function configureAuth() {
        auth0 = await createAuth0Client({
            domain: "dev-Oxxzru015pui85d0.us.auth0.com",
            client_id: "GWN2JjxHHq1CB1m23kCWTOUsFYcAqjdo",
            redirect_uri: "https://pathttt2.netlify.app/callback" // Ensure this matches Auth0 settings
        });

        const isAuthenticated = await auth0.isAuthenticated();

        if (isAuthenticated) {
            const user = await auth0.getUser();
            updateUI(user);
        }
    }

    async function login() {
        await auth0.loginWithPopup();
        const user = await auth0.getUser();
        updateUI(user);
    }

    async function logout() {
        await auth0.logout({
            returnTo: "https://pathttt2.netlify.app" // Redirect after logout
        });
        document.getElementById("user-info").innerText = "";
        document.getElementById("login").style.display = "block";
        document.getElementById("logout").style.display = "none";
    }

    function updateUI(user) {
        document.getElementById("user-info").innerText = "Welcome, " + user.email;
        document.getElementById("login").style.display = "none";
        document.getElementById("logout").style.display = "block";
    }

    document.getElementById("login").onclick = login;
    document.getElementById("logout").onclick = logout;

    window.onload = configureAuth;
</script>
